moves.name: Megahorn
moves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.description: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Steamroller
moves.description: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

moves.name: Rock Climb
moves.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
